styles.css: & { position: relative; width: fit-content; } &::before { content: ''; width: 40px; height: 3px; margin-right: 10px; background-color: var(--wp--preset--color--primary); position: relative; display: inline-block; transform: translateY(calc(-50% - 1.5px)); } &::after { content: ''; width: 40px; height: 3px; margin-left: 10px; background-color: var(--wp--preset--color--primary); position: relative; display: inline-block; transform: translateY(calc(-50% - 1.5px)); }
